name: Beverage Consumption
commitments: I will replace soda with water
I will drink half my body weight in ounces of water each day.

name: Fruit/Vegetable Consumption
commitments: I will eat no less than 4 servings of fresh fruits/vegetables each day
I will eat vegetables with two meals per day

name: Breakfast
commitments: I will wake up 15 min earlier and prepare breakfast; no processed foods.
I will eat a serving of protein with breakfast every day

name: Snacking
commitments: I will replace empty calorie/processed snacks with fruits and vegetables
I will eat no more than 125 calories after my evening meal

name: Mindful Eating
commitments: All meals will have a well-defined beginning and end (no seconds)
I will say a word of thanks before eating each meal, showing gratitude for what I have
I will start a food journal and record all food and beverage consumption
I will make a healthy modification with every meal (i.e. baked instead of fried)
